trans-unit.source: Contains a stacked bar chart that provides you with information about backlogs.

seg-source.mrk: Contains a stacked bar chart that provides you with information about backlogs.

target.mrk: 包含堆叠条形图，为您提供待办事项信息。

trans-unit.source: You can view the details of the maintenance backlogs in any of these categories:

seg-source.mrk: You can view the details of the maintenance backlogs in any of these categories:

target.mrk: 您可以按以下任意类别查看维护待办事项的详细信息：

trans-unit.source: The X-axis is the planning bucket with the backlog details and, the Y-axis is the number of maintenance backlogs against the category from the drop-down.

seg-source.mrk: The X-axis is the planning bucket with the backlog details and, the Y-axis is the number of maintenance backlogs against the category from the drop-down.

target.mrk: X 轴是含待办事项详细信息的计划段，Y 轴是下拉列表中的类别对应的代办事项数量。

trans-unit.source: To view further details and process individual maintenance requests or maintenance orders, you can click on the appropriate colored bar in the chart and thereby navigate to the relevant list views.

seg-source.mrk: To view further details and process individual maintenance requests or maintenance orders, you can click on the appropriate colored bar in the chart and thereby navigate to the relevant list views.

target.mrk: 要查看更多详细信息并处理单个维护请求或维护订单，您可以单击图表中相应的彩色栏，从而导航到相关清单视图。

trans-unit.source: If you select the card header, you navigate to the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Backlog</emphasis> application. By default, the first bucket displayed on the analytical chart is considered for viewing in the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Backlog</emphasis> application.

seg-source.mrk: If you select the card header, you navigate to the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Backlog</emphasis> application.
By default, the first bucket displayed on the analytical chart is considered for viewing in the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Backlog</emphasis> application.

target.mrk: 如果选择卡标题，则导航到<emphasis>管理维护待办事项</emphasis>应用程序。
缺省情况下，考虑将分析图表中显示的第一个段用于在<emphasis>管理维护待办事项</emphasis>应用程序中查看。

trans-unit.source: If you select <uicontrol>By Maintenance Activity Type</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>By Order and Notification Type</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>By Priority</uicontrol>, you navigate to a pre-filtered list of information in the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Notifications and Orders</emphasis> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you select <uicontrol>By Maintenance Activity Type</uicontrol>, <uicontrol>By Order and Notification Type</uicontrol>, or <uicontrol>By Priority</uicontrol>, you navigate to a pre-filtered list of information in the <emphasis>Manage Maintenance Notifications and Orders</emphasis> app.

target.mrk: 如果选择<uicontrol>按维护活动类型</uicontrol>、<uicontrol>按订单和通知类型</uicontrol>或<uicontrol>按优先级</uicontrol>，则导航至<emphasis>管理维护通知和订单</emphasis>应用中的预过滤信息清单。

trans-unit.source: If you select the dimension <uicontrol>By Phase</uicontrol> from the dropdown list and then click on the relevant colored bar, the system directs you as follows:

seg-source.mrk: If you select the dimension <uicontrol>By Phase</uicontrol> from the dropdown list and then click on the relevant colored bar, the system directs you as follows:

target.mrk: 如果从下拉列表中选择维度<uicontrol>按阶段</uicontrol>，然后单击相关彩色条，系统将按如下指示您：

trans-unit.source: If you click on the maintenance requests in the <emphasis>Initiation</emphasis> phase or in the <emphasis>Screening</emphasis> phase, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Display Maintenance Notifications</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you click on the maintenance requests in the <emphasis>Initiation</emphasis> phase or in the <emphasis>Screening</emphasis> phase, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Display Maintenance Notifications</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 如果单击处于<emphasis>启动</emphasis>阶段或<emphasis>审查</emphasis>阶段的维护请求，则导航至<uicontrol>显示维护通知</uicontrol>应用。

trans-unit.source: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Planning</emphasis> phase or in the <emphasis>Approval</emphasis> phase, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Maintenance Orders and Notifications</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Planning</emphasis> phase or in the <emphasis>Approval</emphasis> phase, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Maintenance Orders and Notifications</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 如果单击处于<emphasis>计划</emphasis>阶段或<emphasis>审批</emphasis>阶段的维护订单，则导航至<uicontrol>维护订单和通知</uicontrol>应用。

trans-unit.source: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Preparation</emphasis> phase, you navigate to a pre-filtered list of orders in preparation in the <uicontrol>Manage Maintenance Backlog</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Preparation</emphasis> phase, you navigate to a pre-filtered list of orders in preparation in the <uicontrol>Manage Maintenance Backlog</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 如果单击处于<emphasis>准备</emphasis>阶段的维护订单，则导航至<uicontrol>管理维护待办列表</uicontrol>应用中准备中订单的预过滤清单。

trans-unit.source: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Scheduling</emphasis> phase and if you use <cite>Resource Scheduling</cite>, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Manage Work Center Utilization</uicontrol> app and you can dispatch the maintenance order operations individually. You are only directed to this resource scheduling app if you have assigned the performing work center of at least one of the maintenance order operations to your user in the resource scheduling apps.

seg-source.mrk: If you click on the maintenance orders that are in the <emphasis>Scheduling</emphasis> phase and if you use <cite>Resource Scheduling</cite>, you navigate to the <uicontrol>Manage Work Center Utilization</uicontrol> app and you can dispatch the maintenance order operations individually.
You are only directed to this resource scheduling app if you have assigned the performing work center of at least one of the maintenance order operations to your user in the resource scheduling apps.

target.mrk: 如果单击处于<emphasis>计划</emphasis>阶段的维护订单并使用<cite>资源计划</cite>，则导航至<uicontrol>管理工作中心利用率</uicontrol>应用，并且可以单独分派维护订单工序。
只有在资源计划应用中为您的用户分配了至少一个维护订单工序的执行工作中心，您才会定向到此资源计划应用。

trans-unit.source: If you click on the maintenance orders in the <emphasis>Execution</emphasis> phase or any other subsequent phase, you are directed to the <uicontrol>Maintenance Orders</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you click on the maintenance orders in the <emphasis>Execution</emphasis> phase or any other subsequent phase, you are directed to the <uicontrol>Maintenance Orders</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 如果在<emphasis>执行</emphasis>阶段或任何其他后续阶段单击维护订单，则会转到<uicontrol>维护订单</uicontrol>应用。
